utils.coffee

Functions

  • interpolate
  • ValidationError
  • includes
  • isEmpty
  • isEqual
  • strip

These function are used throughout the library. Many provide cross-platform (server and browser) support for frequently-used functions.

Functions

interpolate(s, args)

simple string interpolation (thanks http:#djangosnippets.org/snippets/2074/) interpolate("%s %s", ["hello", "world"]) returns "hello world"

ValidationError(message, code, args...)

raised by fields during validation * message: the default error message to display * code: the code used to look up an overriding message in the errorMessages hash * args...: arguments used for interpolation with the error message.

includes(a, s)

isEmpty(obj)

isEqual(v1, v2)

a very naive comparison of two objects - will only work with the equivalent of json

strip(str)

remove leading and trailing white space
